actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the disqualification of employed spouses for certain annuities.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the provision which disqualifies certain employed spouses of retired railroad employees from receiving an annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the disqualification of employed spouses for certain annuities.
